title: Texting Tutor: The Wedding Is This Weekend And She's Bailing On The Bride!
description:
Her BFF's destination wedding is THIS WEEKEND and she forgot to book her flight! Oops! Can we help her text the bride that she's just not coming without ending the friendship?! It's #TextingTutor!
